title: Why does league require so much internet?
body: Playing League takes less than 1% of my network, so please tell me why have i never been able to play without lagging? I've been playing league for around 5 years now, and not once, on any internet service or at any location, have i had a nice lag free game. All i really want to do is be able to play ranked, but due to crappy internet I do not try, i can barely play norms now because its just gotten worse (even though i'm currently on the "best" service I've ever played on)

replies.body: Even with spectacular download speeds, you can still have some lag if something is blocking your network's connection with our servers. It might be that you don't have the right ports open or settings for your firewalls, but let's be sure to go over each step in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and we should be able to get to the bottom of this. Hit me back up if you're still having that weird lag!
